bibl.title: The Pagan Cults of Roman Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Oxyrhynchus as a Religious Centre. - III. Oxyrhynchus and its Papyri. - IV. Augustus and the Native Cults. - V. Temples and Cult-places in Oxyrhynchus and the Oxyrhynchite Nome. - VI. Festivals. - VII. Personal Items of Cult. - VIII. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: WHITEHORNE John, The Pagan Cults of Roman Oxyrhynchus.

I. Introduction. - II. Oxyrhynchus as a Religious Centre. - III. Oxyrhynchus and its Papyri. - IV. Augustus and the Native Cults. - V. Temples and Cult-places in Oxyrhynchus and the Oxyrhynchite Nome. - VI. Festivals. - VII. Personal Items of Cult. - VIII. Conclusion.
